string.name: wp_now_activity_name_problems
string.context: Default label for the problem list menu option in the MyChartNow menu. Health issues is the patient-friendly term we are using for problems.

string.name: wp_now_ed_activity_name_problems
string.context: The patient-friendly title for the ED problem list, displayed in the navigation bar at the top of the view

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_medications
string.context: Default label for the medication list menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_schedule
string.context: Default label for the inpatient schedule menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_care_team
string.context: Default label for the care/treatment team menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_care_team_proxy
string.context: Default label for the care/treatment team menu option in the MyChartNow menu for a proxy, where %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_care_team_proxy_no_name
string.context: Default label for the care/treatment team menu option in the MyChartNow menu for a proxy with no name set

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_results
string.context: Default label for the test results menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_education
string.context: Default label for the patient education menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_questionnaires
string.context: Default label for the questionnaires menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_continuing_care
string.context: Default label for the continuing care menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_messages
string.context: Default label for the messages menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_mydocuments
string.context: Default label for the my documents menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_requests
string.context: Default label for the requests menu option in the MyChart Now menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_custom
string.context: Default label for a custom menu option in the MyChartNow menu.

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_onboarding_video
string.context: Default label for an onboarding video option in the MyChartNow menu.

resources.string: Assistir ao Tutorial de Internação Hospitalar

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_onboarding_video_generic
string.context: Label for an onboarding video option in the MyChartNow menu in the ED

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_avs
string.context: Default label for the After Visity Summary menu option in the MyChartNow menu.

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_notes
string.context: Default label for the clinical notes menu option in the MyChartNow menu.

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_workflow_step
string.context: Default label for workflow step widget.

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_proxy_access
string.context: Default label for Manage Friends and Family Access menu option in the MyChartNow menu

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_checklist
string.context: Default activity name for the Checklist menu option in the MyChartNow menu.

string.name: wp_now_activity_name_friendsandfamilyupdates
string.context: Default label for the Friends And Family Updates menu option in the MyChartNow menu.

string.name: wp_now_inpatient_patient_tab_acc_label
string.context: Accessibility label included in the patient tab label to let the user know this patient is admitted

string.name: wp_now_inpatient_activities_header
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within an Inpatient MyChartNow context

string.name: wp_now_emergency_activities_header
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within an Emergency Bedside context. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

string.name: wp_now_inpatient_activities_header_proxy
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within an Inpatient MyChartNow context for a proxy. %1$@ - the patient's name

string.name: wp_now_emergency_activities_header_proxy
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within an Emergency Bedside context for a proxy. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits. %1$@ - the patient's name

string.name: wp_now_inpatient_activities_header_proxy_no_name
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within an Inpatient MyChartNow context for a proxy with no name set

string.name: wp_now_emergency_activities_header_proxy_no_name
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities available within the Emergency Bedside context for a proxy with no name set. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

string.name: wp_now_inpatient_other_activities_header
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities normally available outside of an Inpatient MyChart Now context. Used to distinguish activities useful from within the hospital from those useful outside the hopsital.

string.name: wp_now_emergency_other_activities_header
string.context: Header label that appears above the list of activities normally available outside of an Emergency Bedside context. Used to distinguish activities useful from within the emergency department from those useful outside the current visit. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

string.name: wp_now_context_inpatient_generic_error
string.context: Error message that is displayed when there is a problem loading the details of a MyChart Now inpatient admission

resources.string: Houve um problema ao carregar os detalhes da internação hospitalar

string.name: wp_now_context_emergency_generic_error
string.context: Error message that is displayed when there is a problem loading the details of a Emergency Bedside visit. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

resources.string: Houve um problema ao carregar os detalhes da consulta

string.name: wp_now_admitted
string.context: Describes the date that a patient was admitted to the hospital, or arrived in the ED.

string.name: wp_now_close
string.context: Label for button which will close this activity.

string.name: wp_now_back_home
string.context: Label for button which will close this activity and return the user to the home page.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc
string.context: Tells the user, who is an admitted patient, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora da sua internação hospitalar, vá à sua página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc_emergency
string.context: Tells the user, who is a patient using the Emergency Bedside context, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora da sua consulta atual, vá à sua página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc_proxy
string.context: Tells the user, who is a proxy to an admitted patient, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name. %2$@ is the name of the admitted patient.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora da internação hospitalar de %2$@, vá à página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc_proxy_no_name
string.context: Tells the user, who is a proxy to an admitted patient whose name cannot be determined, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora desta internação hospitalar, vá à sua página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc_proxy_emergency
string.context: Tells the user, who is a proxy to a patient who is in the Emergency Bedside context, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name. %2$@ is the name of the patient.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora da consulta atual de %2$@, vá à sua página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_home_desc_proxy_no_name_emergency
string.context: Tells the user, who is a proxy to a patient who in the Emergency Bedside context, whose name cannot be determined, what will happen if they tap the Go to Home Page button. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits. %1$@ is the organization's MyChart branded name.

resources.string: Para ver informações fora desta consulta atual, vá à sua página inicial do %1$@.

string.name: wp_now_est_discharge
string.context: Describes the date that a patient is expected to be discharged the hospital.

string.name: wp_now_est_discharge_acc_label
string.context: Accessibility label that describes the date that a patient is expected to be discharged the hospital.

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_inpatient
string.context: Default header for an inpatient MyChartNow context

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_inpatient_proxy_no_name
string.context: Default header for an inpatient MyChartNow context for a proxy whose name cannot be determined

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_inpatient_proxy
string.context: Default header for an inpatient MyChartNow context for a proxy. %1$@ - the proxy's name

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_emergency
string.context: Default header for an Emergency Bedside context. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_emergency_proxy_no_name
string.context: Default header for an Emergency Bedside context for a proxy whose name cannot be determined. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits.

string.name: wp_now_encounter_short_description_emergency_proxy
string.context: Default header for an Emergency Bedside context for a proxy. Note that the Emergency Beside context may be used for acute visits that are not specifically Emergency Department visits. %1$@ - the proxy's name

string.name: wp_now_welcome_greeting_no_patient
string.context: Default welcome message greetimg for an inpatient MyChartNow context without a patient name

string.name: wp_now_welcome_greeting
string.context: Default welcome message greetimg for an inpatient MyChart now context with a patient. %1$@ - The patient's name

string.name: wp_now_welcome_header_no_location
string.context: Default welcome message for an inpatient MyChart now context with no location.

string.name: wp_now_welcome_header
string.context: Default welcome message for an inpatient MyChart now context with and location. %1$@ - The location name of the hospital

string.name: wp_now_welcome_button_label
string.context: Default button label for a MyChartNow welcome/onboarding message.

string.name: wp_now_welcome_button_acc_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint letting a VoiceOver user know that this button will dismiss the welcome text.

string.name: wp_now_welcome_video_button_label
string.context: Tutorial button label for MyChartNow welcome/onboarding screen

string.name: wp_now_activity_button_unread_acc_label
string.context: Accessibility label letting a VoiceOver user know which activity this button will launch and that there is new content in the activity. %1$@ - The name of the activity

string.name: wp_now_activity_button_acc_label_classic
string.context: Accessibility label letting a VoiceOver user know which activity this button will launch and the number of new alerts. %1$@ - The name of the activity, %2$@ - The number of new alerts

string.name: wp_now_problem_label_one_problem_name
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this admission when there is a principal problem. This label can be tapped on to go to the problem list. %1$@ is the problem name.

string.name: wp_now_problem_label_one_problem_nonprincipal_name
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this admission when there is only 1 problem but not principal. This label can be tapped on to go to the problem list. %1$@ is the problem name.

string.name: wp_now_problem_label_one_problem_name_proxy
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this admission when there is either a principal problem or only 1 problem. This label can be tapped on to go to the problem list. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@ is the problem name.

string.name: wp_now_ed_one_problem_label
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there is one problem. %1$@ is the problem.

string.name: wp_now_ed_two_problem_label
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there are two problems. %1$@, %2$@ are the problems.

string.name: wp_now_ed_three_problem_label
string.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there are three problems. %1$@, %2$@, %3$@ are the problems.

plurals.name: wp_now_ed_many_problem_label
plurals.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there are four or more reasons for vist. %1$@ is the number of other remaining issues.

string.name: wp_now_ed_one_problem_label_proxy
string.context: Proxy facing Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there is one problem. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@ is the problem.

string.name: wp_now_ed_two_problem_label_proxy
string.context: Proxy Facing Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there are two problems. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@, %3$@ are the problems.

string.name: wp_now_ed_three_problem_label_proxy
string.context: Proxy facing Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this ED visit when there are three problems. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@, %3$@, %4$@ are the problems.

plurals.name: wp_now_problem_label_multiple_problems
plurals.context: Info label on the MyChart Now homescreen header to show the reason for this admission when there is no principal problem but multiple other problems. This label can be tapped on to go to the problem list. Health issues is the patient-friendly term we are using for problems. %1$@ is number of problems.

string.name: wp_now_problem_button_label
string.context: Title of the button that takes the patient to an activity where they can learn more about their problems and health issues. Will be all-caps when displayed.

string.name: wp_now_ed_problem_button_label
string.context: Title of the button that takes the patient to an activity where they can learn more about their problems and health issues. This version is for the ED.

string.name: wp_now_problem_button_acc_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint letting a VoiceOver user know that this button will launch the problems list. Health issues is the patient-friendly term we are using for problems.

string.name: wp_now_problem_button_acc_hint_proxy
string.context: Accessibility hint letting a VoiceOver user know that this button will launch the problems list when viewing as a proxy. Health issues is the patient-friendly term we are using for problems. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_now_ed_problem_button_acc_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint letting a VoiceOver user know that this button will launch the problems list for the ED.

resources.string: Ver as razões para a consulta.

string.name: wp_now_last_updated
string.context: Text that appears under the refresh indicator, informing the user about the last instant the data was updated. %1$@ is the formatted (shortHoursMinutes) instant of the last load or refresh.

string.name: wp_now_visit_ended_title_emergency
string.context: Text that appears in the title of the popup that appears after the current visit has ended.

string.name: wp_now_visit_ended_title
string.context: Text that appears in the title of the popup that appears after the current hospital stay has ended.

string.name: wp_now_visit_ended_text_emergency
string.context: Text that appears in the body of the popup that appears after the current visit has ended.

resources.string: Esta consulta terminou. Você pode revisar os resultados dos exames e encontrar mais informações desta consulta na atividade Consultas.

string.name: wp_now_visit_ended_text
string.context: Text that appears in the body of the popup that appears after the current hospital stay has ended.

resources.string: Esta estadia hospitalar terminou. Você pode revisar os resultados dos exames e encontrar mais informações desta consulta na atividade Consultas.

string.name: wp_now_return_home
string.context: Text that appears in the button after the current visit has ended, prompting the patient to return to the home page

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_default_inpatient
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's inpatient information.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_default_generic
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's Current Visit information.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_care_team_inpatient
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's hospital care team.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_care_team_generic
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's current visit care team.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_problems_list_inpatient
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's hospital health issues.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_medications_inpatient
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's hospital medications within the Medications activity. The other alternative in this tab is outpatient medications with the label Home Medications

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_medications_generic
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's current visit (ED, IP) medications within the Medications activity. The other alternative in this tab is outpatient medications with the label Home Medications

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_test_results_inpatient
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's hospital lab results

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_test_results_generic
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's current visit lab results

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_default_no_context
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's information.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_care_team_no_context
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's outpatient care team.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_problems_list_no_context
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's general problem list.

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_medications_no_context
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a patient's outpatient medications within the Medications activity. The other alternative in this tab is hopsital medications with the label Hospital Medications, or Current Visit Medications when in the Emergency Department or other acute care scenario

string.name: wp_now_tab_label_test_results_no_context
string.context: Label for the tab used to switch to a list of all of the patient's test results

string.name: wp_now_tab_acc_label
string.context: Accessibility label letting a VoiceOver user know which context this button will launch and the number of new alerts. %1$@ - The name of the context, %2$@ - The number of new alerts

string.name: wp_now_tab_acc_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint for switching to a tab in a MyChart Now context. %1$@ = The tab label
